hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer / Creative Coder
hero.marquee: FRONTEND DEVELOPER ■ CREATIVE CODER ■ REACT ■ NEXT.JS ■ TYPESCRIPT ■ GSAP ■

about.label: ABOUT
about.title: Identity
about.bio1: Hi there! I'm Apiwit (Aont) — a Frontend Developer at Maxion Tech, passionate about crafting beautiful and interactive web experiences.
about.bio2: Graduated in Software Engineering from University of Phayao. I love blending creative coding with modern frontend frameworks to build websites that don't just work — they wow.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio with cyberpunk aesthetic, GSAP animations and boot screen sequence.

ecommerce-dashboard.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
ecommerce-dashboard.description: Admin dashboard with real-time analytics, order management and inventory tracking.

chat-app.title: Real-time Chat
chat-app.description: WebSocket-based chat application with typing indicators and message reactions.

design-system.title: Component Library
design-system.description: Reusable UI component library with Storybook documentation and accessibility.

weather-app.title: Weather Visualizer
weather-app.description: Interactive weather app with map visualization and 7-day forecast.

blog-platform.title: Blog Platform
blog-platform.description: MDX-powered blog with syntax highlighting, search and dark mode.

exp-1.description: Full-time frontend developer based in Bangkok (Hybrid). Building modern web applications with cutting-edge frontend technologies.

exp-2.description: Full-time frontend developer in Chiang Mai. Developing UIs with modern frameworks, building custom components, responsive designs, and code review.

exp-4.description: Developed interactive applications using Unity during 6-month internship in Chiang Mai.

exp-5.description: Implemented web client during internship period.
